channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP Yelp Review Slider
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP Yelp Review Slider

item.title: CVE-2023-0263|2024-08-02T05:02:44.140Z -- unknown -- wp%20yelp%20review%20slider
item.description: The WP Yelp Review Slider WordPress plugin before 7.1 does not properly sanitise and escape a parameter before using it in a SQL statement, leading to a SQL injection exploitable by users with a role as low as subscriber.
